subject: Party Reminder!
email-body:
Hey John,

Just a quick reminder that we are having a party next weekend at
location], you're definitely on the guest list! Please let me know if
you're coming so I can make sure we have enough food and drinks.

Can't wait to see you there!

Stacy

subject: Help with my order
email-body:
Dear John,

I am writing to request your assistance with an order I recently placed
with your company. My order number is 09290822121 and it was placed on
12/1/23. Unfortunately, I have run into some issues and I would like to
request your help in resolving them.

If you could look into the matter and let me know what the next steps are,
I would greatly
appreciate it.

Thank you for your help and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,
Smith

subject: Company Annual Picnic
email-body:
Dear All, We are excited to announce that the annual company picnic will be
held on Saturday, June 12th in Dubai. There will be food, games, and
activities for everyone to enjoy. Please RSVP by May 31st to
shreedharraj.personal@gmail.com with the number of attendees from your
team. We look forward to seeing you all there! Best, Shreedhar Raj.

subject: Coffee Catch Up
email-body:
Hey John,

Long time no see! How have you been? I was wondering if you're free for a
catch-up session over coffee sometime next week. Let me know what works for
you and we'll make it happen.

Take care,
Rick

subject: New Senior JavaScript Developer
email-body:
Dear Team,

I am thrilled to announce that Arjun will be joining our team as a Senior
JavaScript Developer on Monday. Arjun comes to us with 13 years of
experience in JavaScript and we are confident that they will be a valuable
asset to the team.
Please join me in welcoming Arjun to the team and make sure to introduce
yourselves when you see them in the office.

Best,
Carlos
